description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter named RestaurantAdapter used to display a list of restaurants in an Android application. It manages view holder creation, data binding, and interactions such as toggling favorites and handling clicks. It also performs UI updates based on restaurant data and external ratings.

classes.name: RestaurantAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Restaurant objects with features like favorite toggling and ratings display.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the restaurant item layout and returns a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds restaurant data to the view components, handling UI updates and interactions.

properties.name: Diff
properties.description: DiffUtil callback for efficiently updating the list.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for restaurant item views, holding references to UI components.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Constructor for RestaurantAdapter, accepting callback functions for click and favorite toggle events.
